name: U need to rewind the game
name_original: U need to rewind the game
description:
What if games had to be rewound like VHS tapes?!

Use the LEFT ARROW, RIGHT ARROW, and SPACEBAR to play. And take note: you have to input everything BACKWARDS to successfully rewind!

Follow the Input Guide in your retro interface it will uh, guide you through the rewind! Careful not to blow your chances or run out of time!

Made for the Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam in 7 days.

Music by RoccoW, used under Attribution-ShareAlike License.
